pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Joint Calibration of Totals and Quantiles // A small package containing functions to perform a joint calibration of totals and quantiles. The calibration for totals is based on Deville and Srndal (1992) doi:10.1080/01621459.1992.10475217, the calibration for quantiles is based on Harms and Duchesne (2006) https://www150.statcan.gc.ca/n1/en/catalogue/12-001-X2006001925 5. The package uses standard calibration via the 'survey', 'sampling' or 'laeken' packages. In addition, entropy balancing via the 'ebal' package and empirical likelihood based on codes from Wu (2005) https://www150.statcan.gc.ca/n1/pub/12-001-x/200 5002/article/9051-eng.pdf can be used. See the paper by Bersewicz and Szymkowiak (2023) for details arXiv:2308.13281.
